role: Full Stack Developer Software Developer Intern
summary: Part of the AI team in Cisco's Security Business Unit. Based in San Jose, California.
Had a valuable opportunity to work in a Series B Silicon Valley startup.

- Developed the Only Rewards mobile application, consisting of  at least 15 screens and features from scratch using the Flutter framework. This was part of Only Technologies' product launch on 9 August 2022. 
   - [Google Play link](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.only.saferide)
   - [Apple App Store link](https://apps.apple.com/sg/app/only-rewards/id1622263310)
 - Designed and developed APIs using ExpressJS and AWS. AWS services used include S3, DynamoDB, AppSync, Cognito and Lambda
 - Developed the MVP for our mobile application using React Native under a tight deadline of one month. Frameworks used include AWS Amplify, AppSync, Lambda, S3 and DynamoDB. The MVP was showcased in NUS GRIP [(Graduate Research Innovation Programme)](https://nus.edu.sg/grip/), an incubator programme in which Only Technologies successfully graduated from.
